SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.interfaces

Interface VirtualClient

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiClient, SocketClientHandler
public interface VirtualClient extends Remote
Defines the methods that can be executed by either a RmiClient and a SocketClientHandler. The methods defined in this interface regard the user. Extends the Rmi Remote interface, used by the RmiClient.
See Also:
  • SocketClientHandler
  • RmiClient
  • Remote

  • Method Details

    • isReady

      boolean isReady() throws RemoteException
      Return the boolean value indicating if the user is ready or not.
      Returns:
      true if the player is ready, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call.

    • setGameID

      void setGameID(int gameID) throws RemoteException
      This method sets the value of the gameID of the player to a value received as a parameter. The gameID identifies the game which is played by the user.
      Parameters:
      gameID - is the identifier of the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call.

    • sendCommand

      void sendCommand(ClientQueueObject obj) throws RemoteException
      This method adds to the VirtualClient the ClientQueueObject received as a parameter. This method is invoked mainly by the Controller, GameController and the SocketClientHandler, can also be invoked by the Listener abstract class and by the GameModel, specifically in the EndGameModelState.endGame(GameModel, String) method. See also the private methods addQueueObject and executor of TCPClient and RmiClient.
      Parameters:
      obj - is the ClientQueueObject that the client should execute.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call.
      See Also:
      • ListenerType
      • GameModelState

    • setController

      void setController(IController controller) throws RemoteException
      This method should set the reference of the Controller attribute of the VirtualClient to the value received as a parameter. It can be invoked by the Controller via the Controller.connect(VirtualClient, String, Integer, Integer) method and usernameValidation private method.
      Parameters:
      controller - is the reference of the Controller to be set to the VirtualClient.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call.

    • setGameController

      void setGameController(IGameController gameController) throws RemoteException
      This method should set the reference of the GameController attribute of the VirtualClient to the value received as a parameter. It can be invoked by the Controller via the Controller.createGame(String, int) method and by the GameController via the GameController.joinGame(String, VirtualClient) and GameController.reJoinGame(String, VirtualClient) methods.
      Parameters:
      gameController - is the reference of the GameController to be set in the VirtualClient.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call.
